column4: hello, sorry to bother you guys, I was just wondering what should I know before upgrading to 11.10 when the time comes. what I mean to say is that I've customized my classic gnome a lot. will it get overwritten by new settings in 11.10? apart from this is any thing else I should expect to fix?
you may want to go to the #ubuntu+1 channel  which is the official channel for pre releases
